Question
========

To investigate the effects of three different drugs, a a study is set up. To this end, the investigator establishes three confidence intervals for the possible comparison of the three drugs. For all comparisons at a minimum of 95%. This is an example of

Answerlist
----------

* 'multiple comparison'
* 'multiple correlation
* 'multiple regression

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 'multiple comparison': Correct
* 'multiple correlation': Incorrect
* 'multiple regression': Incorrect
